scripts.bundle-android: npm run bundle-common-android && npm run bundle-business-android && node removePolyfill.js
scripts.bundle-common-android: npx react-native bundle --config common.metro.config.js --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.bundle.android --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle-business-android: npx react-native bundle --config business.metro.config.js --platform android --dev false --entry-file business.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/business.bundle.android --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
